website_summaries.verdict: Uses Omega-3s that appear naturally in fish oil with EPA and DHA for extra benefits.
pros: This collection of Omega-3s helps with balance, heart health, and circulatory system health
Adds benefits for joint mobility and improved immune system health
Ingredients only sourced from wild caught fish
cons: Some inconsistencies in manufacturing and quality control from bottle to bottle

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins were recommended by my kids pediatrician who specializes in depression and mental health. My child has taken these daily for 5 months and her memory and mood have improved significantly. Her grades went up from a D to As and Bs in great part because she recalls what she learns better. It helps her sleep longer and her preteen mood is so much better. My kid is 12 and in middle school.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best EPA to DHA ratio I can find at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I have ADD and this product has the best EPA to DHA ratio that I can find without spending an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good pills, but not good to buy when hot outside
customer_reviews.text: Meets my expcetation on the ingredients. Shopping via Us mail is the problem. I live in AZ and the oil in the pills melted and stuck together in one big lump. Do NOT order if the temp is 90 degree or higher!
customer_reviews.author: Wxjp

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended High EPA Fish Oil to help lower my triglycerides. This did the trick...cut my triglycerides in half!
customer_reviews.author: A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great clean product!
customer_reviews.text: EPA keeps my cholesterol in check and in combination with conventional treatment, my doctor is Professor in Lipids and this is one part of his prescribed regimen and the only one that has worked so far in 30 years of trying to control hereditary high cholesterol, with the aid of your physician this is a good clean product, EPA and all fish oil is not controlled, ask your doctor and use the recommended amount which may be more or less the recommended amount.
customer_reviews.author: wookiechuck

customer_reviews.title: Best mood vitamins in the market
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are the best in the market! They are easy to swallow, it may not look like at first glance, but they are! They don’t really have a flavor just take it with water and swallow it. These pills have made a difference in my life, it lifts you up in the morning, mood stimulant and it feels like a boost of energy that I needed. It is definitely value for money. I will continue to buy them.

customer_reviews.title: Phew!

Apparently one punctured when pulled apart. Now the rest are contaminated with horrible fish odor. If not for this problem this product would have a high rating.

customer_reviews.title: Significant non-prescription Mood regulation
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be mildly paranoid (assuming others are judging, I feel suspicious of motives, nervous, high startle reflex, etc). I take one pill per day and it's enough to make me present, unafraid, social and happy. I have an ASD child with the same traits and this helps her, too.
customer_reviews.author: Windchimes

customer_reviews.title: No hype to this product, it works.
customer_reviews.text: While this will thin the blood some, I still think this stuff is great. I noticed a big difference after 6months(first taking their DHA Xtra-with some EPA for about 4 months, then learning I had it backwards, taking this for the rest.) in both overall mood and thinking. I haven't had an issue with fish burps or breath, only lemon of each. They are easy to swallow and are mercury free. The exp date has always been 1 or more years in advance.There are alot of counterfeits out there, but this vendor(NetRush) is one of the safe ones. If they don't carry the Nordic product you want, their website has a list of vendors to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: HopsHead

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about this product
customer_reviews.text: Been taking this for a couple of months now on the advice of my nutritionist. Can't say enough good things about this product. If you're not getting enough of this in your diet (and who is), the difference in just 2-3 mo is pretty impressive. My memory is much sharper (don't struggle to remember names, etc), brain just seems to be firing on all cylinders again. My nails and hair have also improved quite a bit. My hair dresser asked what I had been doing because I had so much new growth. Dementia runs in my family.. I'll take this the rest of my life in hopes of delaying or preventing that.
customer_reviews.author: swebby

customer_reviews.title: Significanly Effective - you WILL notice a difference!
customer_reviews.text: This is a remarkably effective and beneficial product: extremely helpful to a family member managing OCD without pharmaceuticals; remarkably helpful to me by delivering sustained mental clarity, focus, energy and positive can-do state of well-being (at age 56 I've definitely got my groove back!). I find the benefits immediate and readily apparent at just one soft gel cap per day. No fishy taste, no fishy burps, no down-side what so ever. The efficacy of Omega supplements varies considerably. The Nordic Naturals line offers a very quality product (large but surprisingly easy to swallow). If you are looking for an EPA boost, you've found it!
customer_reviews.author: MsBrola

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference
customer_reviews.text: I have taken Nordic Naturals fish oil for years, but recently read about the positive impact additional EPA can have to elevate mood and regulate hormones. One week into the new bottle of EPA Extra and I already feel a significant beneficial difference in my mood as well as my digestion, which is a plus I wasn't expecting. So glad I stumbled upon the article recommending a fish oil with additional EPA since it has made a huge difference already.
customer_reviews.author: HillsideHaven

customer_reviews.title: Seem to help!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with anxiety/maternal depression with my current pregnancy and I do notice a difference if I miss a day taking these. It seems to be easier to be positive and keep the anxiety at bay when I regularly take these. Maybe it's just a placebo effect, but there is no fishy aftertaste and even though it is a little expensive for the bottle, it seems worth it right now.
customer_reviews.author: C Dear

customer_reviews.title: all stuck together and oily
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years. They are usually perfect when I get them. I buy 3 or more bottles at a time and try to get them during cool weather because I am in TX and they do not like heat. I keep them in the refrigerator when they come in. The last two orders have been poorly packed, some gelcaps are leaky and the bottles have massive wads that are welded together. I am going back to find the last batch I bought that was good and order from that vendor. Together, we take 6 or 8 a day. They are pricey at best. This is not the vendor to purchase them from.
customer_reviews.author: A Texan

customer_reviews.title: Good for inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I was using Dha before but came across an article saying that for inflammation EPA works better, so been taking it since.

Their quality is unsurpassed. When I investigated their quality program, I did not get a lot of marketing mumbo-jumbo, but rather solid factual information. They might not be the cheapest, but they are by far the best value.

Be careful when purchasing any nutritional products from companies because you might not be getting what they claim you are getting. Lots of duds out there.

product_meta.title: Nordic Naturals - EPA Xtra, Promotes Mood and Heart Health, and Optimal Immune Function, 60 Soft Gels
feature_bullets: HIGH CONCENTRATION EPA: Nordic Naturals EPA Xtra offers an exceptionally high concentration of EPA, and also contains DHA for balance. EPA supports a healthy heart and circulatory system, helps maintain joint mobility, and encourages proper immune function.
BETTER TOGETHER: Omega-3s EPA and DHA occur naturally together in fish oil and work together in the body. Research shows that each fatty acid has unique benefits.

WILD CAUGHT and SUSTAINABLY SOURCED: Every batch of Nordic Naturals fish oil is crafted from wild-caught, omega-rich fish from the freshest catch, sourced from the cleanest waters, and only in a way that fully protects the ocean's fragile ecosystem.

BEST ABSORPTION FOR BEST RESULTS: Many concentrated fish oils on the market are in the ethyl ester molecular form, a synthetic fat with only about 30 years of history in the human diet. Nordic Naturals formulas are produced in true triglyceride form to ensure optimal absorption and results.

THE ALPHA OF OMEGAS: At Nordic Naturals we believe that omega oils are essential to life. By correcting the global omega-3 deficiency, we give each generation what they need to grow healthy and strong. Through science and innovation, we are committed to delivering safe, effective omega oils.
